cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 75 miles WNW of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing west-northwest across Hispaniola toward the Turks & Caicos and southeastern Bahamas, then near or north of central Cuba before turning into the southeast Gulf of Mexico and toward the northern Gulf Coast.

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch for Haiti (northern coast to Gonaives), Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas, and the Cuban provinces of Ciego de Avila eastward to Guantanamo.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning for the Dominican Republic south coast from Punta Palenque eastward and north coast from the DR/Haiti border eastward.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Hispaniola, Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas, northern coast of Cuba, Florida Keys, and eventually the northern Gulf Coast.
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty showers with winds generally below gale force; brief gusts could approach 30–35 mph.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible with localized ponding of water and minor flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along exposed beaches.
